TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebReferenceCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebReferenceCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class WebReferenceCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Describes a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來傳遞的集合物件時叫用靜態方法類別。Use this class to pass a collection of objects when invoking the static method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個類別。The following code example illustrates the use of this class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的 Web 參考的索引大於一比最後一個附加的 Web 參考的索引。The index of the appended Web reference is greater by one than the index of the last appended Web reference. 索引以零起始。The index is zero based. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法。The following code example illustrates the use of this method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Sub CopyTo (array As WebReference(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::Services::Description::WebReference ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: Web 參考的陣列，集合成員會複製至其中。

span.span: An array of Web references into which the collection members are copied.

param.name: index
param.span: 要開始複製的陣列索引。

span.span: The array index at which to begin copying.

summary.span: 從指定的陣列索引處開始，將集合的成員複製至指定的陣列。

span.span: Copies members of the collection to a specified array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引以零起始。The index is zero based. 陣列必須夠大，無法容納集合複製到指定的陣列索引處開始它的內容。The array must be large enough to fit the contents of the collection copied into it starting at the specified array index. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. summary.span: 在指定索引處插入指定的 執行個體。

span.span: Inserts the specified instance at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的成員的索引與索引高於`index`是每個以一遞增。The indices of members of the collection with indices higher than `index` are each increased by one. 索引是以零為起始。Indices are zero based. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含指定的 Web 參考多個執行個體，則會移除第一個執行個體。If the collection contains multiple instances of the specified Web reference, only the first instance is removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method.
